content: welcome the newest addition with a beautiful baby afghan this lovely baby afghan pattern is easy to crochet and uses medium weight yarn and a 5 mm h hook the finished baby blanket is lightweight and machine washable the project is crocheted with mainly double_crochet stitches the stitch pattern multiple is provided to allow you to make this to any size you wish soft and beautiful this baby blanket will make the perfect gift - change up the colors to those preferred by the expectant parents to make the blanket perfect for boys or girls have fun with your yarn rhondda ps it is never recommended to leave baby alone with a blanket - so please take necessary precautions to keep baby safe
